name: CatSet
description:
• Drag cats to create sets of 3
  • Cats have 3 qualities: color, background, and markings
  • A set is balanced as long no two cats share a quality that the third cat doesn't
  • It's fine for all the cats to be all the same in one quality and all different in another
  • Make sure your waiting area doesn't exceed maximum capacity!

Created by Rose Abernathy for Train Jam 2016
